statements: SELECT incident_id, timestamp, employee_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incident_logs;
SELECT * FROM security_incident_logs WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incident_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT description FROM security_incident_logs WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM security_incident_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM security_incident_logs WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM security_incident_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, employee_id FROM security_incident_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_type FROM security_incident_logs;
SELECT * FROM security_incident_logs WHERE description LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, description, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM breach_records ORDER BY affected_records DESC;
SELECT id, breach_type, affected_records FROM breach_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Leak' AND severity < 4;
SELECT AVG(severity) as average_severity, MAX(severity) as max_severity FROM security_incidents;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records FROM breach_records WHERE breach_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT id, incident_date, incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity <= 2 ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, employee_id FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM BreachLogs WHERE breach_type = 'Data breach';
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, breach_type FROM BreachLogs ORDER BY breach_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_date, employee_id FROM RemoteWorkLogs;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, employee_id, incident_description FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, breach_type, employee_id, breach_description FROM BreachLogs WHERE breach_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT log_id, log_date, employee_id, log_description FROM RemoteWorkLogs WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%security breach%';
SELECT breach_id, breach_date, breach_type FROM BreachLogs ORDER BY breach_date ASC, breach_type DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT id, description FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT incident_date, status FROM security_incidents WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_date, user_id FROM incident_logs WHERE incident_id = 1001;
SELECT id, incident_date, description, severity, status FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY last_login ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, incident_id, log_date, log_description, user_id FROM incident_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT team_id, team_name, lead_investigator FROM investigation_team WHERE team_name LIKE '%Fraud%' ORDER BY team_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, description, status FROM security_incidents WHERE id IN (SELECT incident_id FROM incident_logs WHERE user_id = 123) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT incident_description, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity >= 3;
SELECT investigator_name, report_details FROM forensic_reports WHERE incident_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM network_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_timestamp FROM user_activities_logs WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT incident_description, date FROM security_incidents WHERE severity = 10 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT network_logs.log_description, network_logs.log_timestamp, employee_logs.log_description, employee_logs.log_timestamp FROM network_logs JOIN employee_logs ON network_logs.id = employee_logs.id;

SELECT user_activities_logs.activity_description, user_activities_logs.activity_timestamp, forensic_reports.investigator_name, forensic_reports.report_details FROM user_activities_logs JOIN forensic_reports ON user_activities_logs.id = forensic_reports.incident_id;
SELECT incident_description, date, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY severity DESC, date ASC;
